html:
1.25.20  10:47 pm   What time do you usually answer questions?

     Sunday, January 26, 2020 10:08:58 AM, for example

1.25.20  10:36 pm   Yo, how is it coming with the whole programing thing?

     stupid. am stupid. that is my new name, i'm changing it

1.25.20  10:14 pm   gonna go to Mac Donald. want anything?

     can you get me the sign

1.25.20  10:12 pm   your music is what is getting me through my life tonight. thank you so much for all you've done and keep doing for all of us

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

1.25.20  10:05 pm   Since your taking the time to learn 3d, how long would you expect your next video to be? Long like History of the entire world, or a short song with a deeper meaning?

     i don't care how long the 'next' video is, i only care how long the videos can be in general

1.25.20  10:04 pm   how do i walk

     i will be giving an easy demonstration

1.25.20  9:43 pm   Is it possible for you to make a bad song?

     yes

1.25.20  9:15 pm   How do I spend life

     you could experiment with curved lines, other types of lines,

1.25.20  9:00 pm   do you do anything on the day 1 month after christmas?

     yes, i like to do things every day

1.25.20  8:58 pm   Do you get tired of people always commenting "you could make a religion out of this"?

     no, it's a very good suggestion

1.25.20  8:53 pm   I'm bored what should I do

     how about getting struck by lightning

1.25.20  8:13 pm   who'll win the super bowl?

     FOX

1.25.20  7:42 pm   What's the countdown timer at

     25

1.25.20  7:32 pm   how's learning editing software going?

     i am not so much concerned with the editing as with how to make the thing in the first place

1.25.20  7:23 pm   Hey Bill Love Your Stuff what instruments do you play?

     all the extremely normal ones

1.25.20  6:48 pm   Quick how do I tear a piece of paper

     you could hold it with 2 hands and then get surprised

1.25.20  6:47 pm   Do you believe in life after love?

     yes but it's even better if you put them at the same time

1.25.20  6:39 pm   What did I just walk in to?

     door

1.25.20  6:14 pm   What is the worst video you've ever made?

     oh nice try, then everyone is gonna go check to see how bad it is

1.25.20  5:59 pm   did you just do a bad thing

     no but i was thinking of doing it in the future

1.25.20  5:48 pm   what do you remember from school?

     doors,

1.25.20  5:37 pm   how do i fly

     you could probably glitch up a tree or something, and that could get you started

1.25.20  4:59 pm   What is the meaning of life

     you

1.25.20  4:48 pm   when is the next song comming?

     right away

1.25.20  4:04 pm   Is there really such thing as too cool for school? 

     you can just keep switching schools, there is always a cooler school, and if there's not then you are supposed to make a school

1.25.20  4:02 pm   What makes something good?

     how bad it is

1.25.20  3:43 pm   Carpeted kitchen or carpeted bathroom?

     how about just carpet all the sinks

1.25.20  3:19 pm   Why is it today again?

     it's you

1.25.20  2:47 pm   I was trying to open a can with a can opener to eat the inside contents. But I couldn't properly work it, so I ate the can opener. Is this good?

     no

1.25.20  2:46 pm   What are the units of measurement on the count down timer

     integers

1.25.20  2:43 pm   are you having a pleasurable day?

     yes but it has business in it too

1.25.20  2:38 pm   what's bill + wurtz

     i'll have to think about that

1.25.20  2:19 pm   When will you come back from learning 3D animation 

     uefcking right away. the hens and chickens are so full grown their eggs have started laying eggs

1.25.20  2:00 pm   How's the new video coming along? Or is it coming ashort i'm not sure

     all hell is breaking loose in a time capsule from 1983, nbc studio 6a. i can't really publish this because nbc might get mad at me, but i will assuredly slip it onto a side page on this website as usual, ONLY AFTER i have done several things much more legitimate first. as usual. it's business as usual here at bill wurtz dot com

1.25.20  1:58 pm   any advice for getting out of a musical rut?

     yes, you're gonna wanna make songs about that rut

1.25.20  1:53 pm   Have you seen my empty bottle of hot sause?

     i have seen the sause, not the bottle

1.25.20  1:53 pm   what is your favorite chord

     F

1.25.20  1:49 pm   what is, perhaps, the funniest

     comedy, hands down

1.25.20  1:37 pm   What is the best color?

     none of them are any good

1.25.20  1:36 pm   How do i not be sad?

     change the world

1.25.20  1:20 pm   What defines sexy pants?

     you. someone's gotta do it

1.25.20  1:18 pm   Should i try chips?

     i think someone else already tried them

1.25.20  1:08 pm   R u working on a video rn

     yes but unfortunately i can't show you because it is just only an experiment

1.25.20  12:41 pm   should i return my library books

     yes but memorize them first

1.25.20  12:37 pm   are u alive

     yes

     and will u make more videos?

     i almost didn't think of that

1.25.20  12:32 pm   how do you find the balance between professionalism and overproduction? you obviously did something right so what was it cos i tend to either record somethin crap-ly as a demo but then not go back and fix it, or spend way to long trying to get it invisibly perfect

     you have to have an absolute mid life crisis and hit rock bottom and then make a schedule which has resemblences to a television station

1.25.20  12:00 pm   Do you know what it's like to know what you are doing wrong and continue to do so apathetically?

     sort of, but i usually stop

      How do you get over it?

     stop and prime factorize numbers in your head until you can't take it any more and you would rather figure out what you were doing wrong before

1.25.20  11:53 am   Did you know that if it could, a platypus is the only animal that could make its own custard.

     i am pretty sure humans have figured out how to make custard. actually i don't know what custard is, but i will tell you i've definitely seen 'custard' written in human writing

1.25.20  11:44 am   What are your thoughts on toast?

     it reminds me of something brand new, that i've never thought of before

1.25.20  11:36 am   may i borrow your brain for a minute?

     sure
